column5: I ned to find some free (or cheap) photo editing software for a client... what do you guys use??
What kind of editing?  Photoshop type stuff?  Working in layers?  Or simple crop and resize, contrast, brightness, etc?

well photoshop.....  but I like photodeluxe 4 it's the baby brother of photoshop, does 95% of what photoshop does but much simpler to use I use it for 90% of my editting.. they don't make/sell it anymore but there are lots of copies around, it was what kodak gave away when the first started selling digi camera...... I have a copy....we could talk
"Or simple crop and resize, contrast, brightness, etc?"   Thats what im looking for...  something easy...
Check out Picasa, a free product from Google. http://picasa.google.com/
Try using the search feature on this site...jeez.. http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=7379
Picasa is simple, easy to use and free! I like it! HH
Tj try to google "Paint.net" Its free and is pretty good...  Photoshop is still the best though!!
This thread belongs in the photography section. Oh wait. It's not up yet. Roy??
I've been using Irfanview ever since Roy recommended it many moons ago...the price is right FREE !!!
